alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Southern Ware; Western Charlton (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 6:12PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Nassau, northwestern Baker, northeastern Columbia, west central Camden, southeastern Ware, southeastern Clinch and Charlton Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 612 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles south of Stephen Foster State Park, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Folkston, Stephen Foster State Park and Homeland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Clinch; Inland Camden; Northeastern Charlton; Southern Ware; Western Charlton
